Class.name: Report.VARFINAPPositivePay
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.FINGLBank.Company as FINGLBank_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.Company as FINAPPaymentLine_Company,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Company as FINAPPayment_Company,SQLUser.FINGLBank.BankBSB as BSBNumber,SQLUser.FINGLBank.BankAccountNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.ChequeNumber as CheckNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.TotalBASE as Amount,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Dateofcheque,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.Name as SupplierName,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.Number as PayNumberHeader,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber as PayNumberLine,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.BankAccount,SQLUser.FINGLBank.AccountNumber,SQLUser.FINAPPayment.CheckDateAmerican as CheckDate from SQLUser.FINGLBank,SQLUser.FINAPPaymentLine,SQLUser.FINAPPayment where FINAPPayment.Number = FINAPPaymentLine.PaymentNumber And FINAPPayment.BankAccount = FINGLBank.AccountNumber
